sense.def:
To restrict something
pomeni postaviti meje čemu ali ustaviti nekaj, da ne postane preveliko.

seg.quote: A third possibility would be to restrict wage increases.
...the restricted field of vision provided by the camera.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To restrict people or animals
pomeni zmanjšati gibanje ali delovanje ljudi ali živali.

seg.quote: Some manufacturers were not prepared to restrict themselves voluntarily.

sense.def:
To restrict someone's activities to one thing
pomeni poskrbeti, da ljudje lahko delajo samo določeno stvar in ničesar drugega.

seg.quote: The State should restrict its activities to the maintenance of law and order.
I will restrict myself to countries where English is the main language.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is restricted to a particular group
, tisto lahko ima ali stori samo določena skupina.
